column4: no way i can update ubntu witouth a cd? i started doing like he upgradelist said,and it starts to need cds apparently:S someon please pm me,i need help...Thank
open  menu > system > admin > software sources, and uncheck the cd from the frist tab,  right at tthe bottom,  then try the upgrade again
the 8 is the year and the 4 is the month
